Headline: Purple and Yellow Line Boarding change at Howard
ShortDescription: Purple and Yellow Line will board and alight on the 95th-bound side of the platform at the Howard. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Purple and Yellow Line is experiencing delays. Trains in both directions are operating on the same track at Howard due to police activity.

Purple and Yellow Line will board and alight on the 95th-bound side of the platform at the Howard.
We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
